LanguageData.Arachne_Regen.label: regen
LanguageData.Arachne_Regen.description: Passive regen for arachne. Can even regrow limbs! Applies to whole body regardless of current body part.
LanguageData.Arachne_ProtoBodypart.label: regrowing
LanguageData.Arachne_ProtoBodypart.description: This body part is regrowing, it will cause quite a bit of pain until it's done doing so.
LanguageData.Arachne_CuredBodypart.label: cured bodypart
LanguageData.Arachne_CuredBodypart.description: You should never actually see this info.
